title: 游戏崩溃
author: PiiDui
txt_content:
AL lib: (EE) alc_cleanup: 1 device not closed
Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM warning: INFO: os::commit_memory(0x0000000746000000, 419430400, 0) failed; error='页面文件太小，无法完成操作。' (DOS error/errno=1455)好多次了 为什么崩溃 如何解决

replies.author: PiiDui
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-3-16 16:41
尝试多分配一点内存
游戏内存吗

replies.author: PiiDui
replies.txt_content:
PiiDui 发表于 2020-3-16 16:43
游戏内存吗
可是还是崩呀

replies.author: BlueeyeNB
replies.txt_content: 页面文件是不是分辨率问题？

replies.author: PiiDui
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-3-16 16:41
尝试多分配一点内存
AL lib: (EE) alc_cleanup: 1 device not closed

# Native memory allocation (mmap) failed to map 553648128 bytes for Failed to commit area from 0x000000071c000000 to 0x000000073d000000 of length 553648128.

Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM warning: INFO: os::commit_memory(0x000000071c000000, 553648128, 0) failed; error='页面文件太小，无法完成操作。' (DOS error/errno=1455)

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
PiiDui 发表于 2020-3-16 16:49
AL lib: (EE) alc_cleanup: 1 device not closed

# Native memory allocation (mmap) failed to map 553 ...
关掉一些开着的软件

replies.author: PiiDui
replies.txt_content: 换了个端就好啦 谢谢

replies.author: 洞穴夜莺
replies.txt_content: 观察有无hs_err_pid开头的文件生成

replies.author: GrizzzKap
replies.txt_content: 分配的内存太少了 你的机子内存有多大

replies.author: Comedesrt
replies.txt_content: 说的是启动器的分辨率设置

replies.author: PiiDui
replies.txt_content:
Billy12345 发表于 2020-3-16 17:25

全部上传一下

replies.author: 你可太棒了
replies.txt_content: 先尝试分配内存 实在不行更换启动器
